Title: Establishes an affordable housing program
Summary: Establishes an affordable housing program to be administered by the division of homes and community renewal which will provide loans or grants to certain property owners; provides that property owners receiving such loans or grants shall rent such property for no more than thirty-three percent of a tenant's income.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 - 1303, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing an affordable housing program
